nav.viewAllServicesDescription: Explore our complete range of physical therapy services

treatmentsSection.title: Treatment Methods
treatmentsSection.description: Our physical therapy treatment methods include a range of solutions to meet your individual needs.

therapy.title: Therapy
therapy.description: Multi-method therapy to improve all musculoskeletal pain, injury, and bone conditions

consultation.title: Deep Consultation
consultation.description: Expert functional health assessment and personalized treatment plans for each customer

muscleRelaxation.title: Muscle Relaxation
muscleRelaxation.description: Reduce muscle tension, improve movement health

basicTraining.title: Basic Training
basicTraining.description: 1-on-1 coaching with rehab exercises to improve posture and post-injury recovery

servicesPage.title: Specialized Treatment Methods
servicesPage.description: Choose the problem you're facing to find the most suitable treatment method

problemSelection.emptyState: No problem categories found. Please add categories in Sanity Studio.

emptyState.noTreatmentsDesc: Services do not have specific treatment protocols yet. Please contact us for consultation.
emptyState.noMatchesDesc: Please select a different problem or contact us for more consultation

booking.title: Book Consultation
booking.notePlaceholder: Example: I would like to book in the morning...

validation.nameFormat: Full name can only contain letters

toast.successMessage: Your booking request has been sent. We will contact you soon!

cupping.title: Cupping
cupping.description: Method using vacuum suction to relieve pain and relax muscles.

tapping.title: Tapping
tapping.description: Light tapping method to stimulate muscles and nerves, reduce stress and improve circulation.

heatLight.title: Infrared Light
heatLight.description: Therapy using infrared light to warm muscles, improve blood circulation and relieve pain.

iastm.title: IASTM (Soft Tissue Mobilization Tool)
iastm.description: Technique using specialized tools to stimulate and improve soft tissue, reduce pain and enhance recovery.

coldPlunge.title: Cold Plunge
coldPlunge.description: Cold water therapy to reduce pain and improve circulation.

dryNeedling.title: Dry Needling
dryNeedling.description: Technique using small needles to stimulate muscle trigger points and relieve chronic pain.

dds.title: Bioelectric Therapy (DDS)
dds.description: Therapy using light electrical current to stimulate muscles and nerves, relieve pain and promote recovery.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Holistic Physical Therapy Clinic, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our clinic or use our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Personal identification information (name, date of birth, contact details)
Health and medical information relevant to your treatment
Insurance and payment information
Communication preferences and appointment history

useOfInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
useOfInformation.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our physical therapy services
Process appointments and communicate with you about your treatment
Process payments and insurance claims
Send you appointment reminders and health-related information
Comply with legal obligations and regulations

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We may share your information with:
items: Healthcare providers involved in your care
Insurance companies for billing and claims processing
Legal authorities when required by law
Service providers who assist in our operations (subject to confidentiality agreements)

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
items: Access and receive a copy of your personal information
Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)
Withdraw consent for certain uses of your information
File a complaint with relevant data protection authorities

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through the information provided on our website.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Holistic Physical Therapy Clinic. By accessing our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Holistic Physical Therapy Clinic provides physical therapy services, wellness consultations, and related healthcare services. Our services are provided by licensed and qualified healthcare professionals.

appointmentsAndCancellations.title: Appointments and Cancellations
appointmentsAndCancellations.content: By scheduling an appointment, you agree to:
items: Arrive on time for scheduled appointments
Provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling
Pay cancellation fees for late cancellations or no-shows as per our policy
Provide accurate health information required for treatment

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: Payment for services is due at the time of service unless other arrangements have been made. We accept various payment methods and work with insurance providers to process claims on your behalf.

consentToTreatment.title: Consent to Treatment
consentToTreatment.content: By using our services, you consent to receive physical therapy treatment and acknowledge that:
items: You have been informed about the nature of the treatment
You understand the potential risks and benefits
You have had the opportunity to ask questions
You authorize the healthcare professionals to proceed with treatment

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: While we strive to provide the highest quality care, Holistic Physical Therapy Clinic shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services, except as required by law.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us through the information provided on our website.

introduction.title: What Are Cookies
introduction.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our site.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.content: We use the following types of cookies:
items: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and settings
Marketing Cookies: Track your browsing habits to show relevant advertisements

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
items: Keep you signed in to your account
Understand and improve our website performance
Remember your language and region preferences
Analyze website traffic and user behavior
Provide personalized content and recommendations

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website and limit your ability to use certain features.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics and social media platforms that may set their own cookies. These third parties have their own privacy policies, and we recommend reviewing them to understand how they use cookies.

updates.title: Updates to Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this page periodically for the latest information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us through the information provided on our website.
